mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS food_id, f.food_name, f.description, f.picture, nc.name_en, nc.name_cn, fn.content, fn.status FROM foods f LEFT JOIN food_nut fn ON f.id = fn.food_id AND fn.status = 2 LEFT JOIN nutritional_components nc ON fn.nut_id = nc.id JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT food_id FROM food_nut ORDER BY food_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}) t ON f.id = t.food_id ORDER BY f.id, nc.id;
